clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of CCX354-C in Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis Partially Responsive to Methotrexate Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 2 Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of CCX354-C in Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis Partially Responsive to Methotrexate Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, Phase 2 study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of CCX354-C in subjects with rheumatoid arthritis partially responsive to methotrexate therapy.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

secondary_outcome.measure: The change from baseline to week 12 of Disease Activity Score for 28 Joints using C-reactive proteine (DAS28-CRP)

intervention.description: 200mg film-coated tablets once daily for 12 weeks + Methotrexate
Placebo film-coated tablets twice daily for 12 weeks + methotrexate
